198  public void testBug3790() throws Exception {
199  String field2OldValue = "foo";
200  String field2NewValue = "bar";
201  int field1OldValue = 1;
202 
203  Connection conn1 = null;
204  Connection conn2 = null;
205  Statement stmt1 = null;
206  Statement stmt2 = null;
207  ResultSet rs2 = null;
208 
209  Properties props = new Properties();
210 
211  try {
212  createTable("testBug3790",
213  "(field1 INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, field2 VARCHAR(32)) ",
214  "InnoDB");
215  this.stmt.executeUpdate("INSERT INTO testBug3790 VALUES ("
216  + field1OldValue + ", '" + field2OldValue + "')");
217 
218  conn1 = getConnectionWithProps(props); // creates a new connection
219  conn2 = getConnectionWithProps(props); // creates another new
220  // connection
221  conn1.setAutoCommit(false);
222  conn2.setAutoCommit(false);
223 
224  stmt1 = conn1.createStatement();
225  stmt1.executeUpdate("UPDATE testBug3790 SET field2 = '"
226  + field2NewValue + "' WHERE field1=" + field1OldValue);
227  conn1.commit();
228 
229  stmt2 = conn2.createStatement();
230 
231  rs2 = stmt2.executeQuery("SELECT field1, field2 FROM testBug3790");
232 
233  assertTrue(rs2.next());
234  assertTrue(rs2.getInt(1) == field1OldValue);
235  assertTrue(rs2.getString(2).equals(field2NewValue));
236  } finally {
237  if (rs2 != null) {
238  rs2.close();
239  }
240 
241  if (stmt2 != null) {
242  stmt2.close();
243  }
244 
245  if (stmt1 != null) {
246  stmt1.close();
247  }
248 
249  if (conn1 != null) {
250  conn1.close();
251  }
252 
253  if (conn2 != null) {
254  conn2.close();
255  }
256  }

267  public void testCollation41() throws Exception {
268  if (versionMeetsMinimum(4, 1) && isAdminConnectionConfigured()) {
269  Map<String, String> charsetsAndCollations = getCharacterSetsAndCollations();
270  charsetsAndCollations.remove("latin7"); // Maps to multiple Java
271  // charsets
272  charsetsAndCollations.remove("ucs2"); // can't be used as a
273  // connection charset
274 
275  for (String charsetName : charsetsAndCollations.keySet()) {
276  Connection charsetConn = null;
277  Statement charsetStmt = null;
278 
279  try {
280  //String collationName = charsetsAndCollations.get(charsetName);
281 
282  Properties props = new Properties();
283  props.put("characterEncoding", charsetName);
284 
285  System.out.println("Testing character set " + charsetName);
286 
287  charsetConn = getAdminConnectionWithProps(props);
288 
289  charsetStmt = charsetConn.createStatement();
290 
291  charsetStmt
292  .executeUpdate("DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS testCollation41");
293  charsetStmt
294  .executeUpdate("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS testCollation41");
295 
296  charsetStmt
297  .executeUpdate("CREATE DATABASE testCollation41 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET "
298  + charsetName);
299  charsetConn.setCatalog("testCollation41");
300 
301  // We've switched catalogs, so we need to recreate the
302  // statement to pick this up...
303  charsetStmt = charsetConn.createStatement();
304 
305  StringBuffer createTableCommand = new StringBuffer(
306  "CREATE TABLE testCollation41"
307  + "(field1 VARCHAR(255), field2 INT)");
308 
309  charsetStmt.executeUpdate(createTableCommand.toString());
310 
311  charsetStmt
312  .executeUpdate("INSERT INTO testCollation41 VALUES ('abc', 0)");
313 
314  int updateCount = charsetStmt
315  .executeUpdate("UPDATE testCollation41 SET field2=1 WHERE field1='abc'");
316  assertTrue(updateCount == 1);
317  } finally {
318  if (charsetStmt != null) {
319  charsetStmt
320  .executeUpdate("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS testCollation41");
321  charsetStmt
322  .executeUpdate("DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS testCollation41");
323  charsetStmt.close();
324  }
325 
326  if (charsetConn != null) {
327  charsetConn.close();
328  }
329  }
330  }
331  }

340  public void testSetReadOnly() throws Exception {
341  Properties props = new Properties();
342  props.put("autoReconnect", "true");
343 
344  String sepChar = "?";
345 
346  if (BaseTestCase.dbUrl.indexOf("?") != -1) {
347  sepChar = "&";
348  }
349 
350  Connection reconnectableConn = DriverManager.getConnection(
351  BaseTestCase.dbUrl + sepChar + "autoReconnect=true", props);
352 
353  this.rs = reconnectableConn.createStatement().executeQuery(
354  "SELECT CONNECTION_ID()");
355  this.rs.next();
356 
357  String connectionId = this.rs.getString(1);
358 
359  reconnectableConn.setReadOnly(true);
360 
361  boolean isReadOnly = reconnectableConn.isReadOnly();
362 
363  Connection killConn = getConnectionWithProps((Properties) null);
364 
365  killConn.createStatement().executeUpdate("KILL " + connectionId);
366  Thread.sleep(2000);
367 
368  SQLException caughtException = null;
369 
370  int numLoops = 8;
371 
372  while (caughtException == null && numLoops > 0) {
373  numLoops--;
374 
375  try {
376  reconnectableConn.createStatement().executeQuery("SELECT 1");
377  } catch (SQLException sqlEx) {
378  caughtException = sqlEx;
379  }
380  }
381 
382  System.out
383  .println("Executing statement on reconnectable connection...");
384 
385  this.rs = reconnectableConn.createStatement().executeQuery(
386  "SELECT CONNECTION_ID()");
387  this.rs.next();
388  assertTrue("Connection is not a reconnected-connection",
389  !connectionId.equals(this.rs.getString(1)));
390 
391  try {
392  reconnectableConn.createStatement().executeQuery("SELECT 1");
393  } catch (SQLException sqlEx) {
394  ; // ignore
395  }
396 
397  reconnectableConn.createStatement().executeQuery("SELECT 1");
398 
399  assertTrue(reconnectableConn.isReadOnly() == isReadOnly);
400  }

402  private Map<String, String> getCharacterSetsAndCollations() throws Exception {
403  Map<String, String> charsetsToLoad = new HashMap<String, String>();
404 
405  try {
406  this.rs = this.stmt.executeQuery("SHOW character set");
407 
408  while (this.rs.next()) {
409  charsetsToLoad.put(this.rs.getString("Charset"),
410  this.rs.getString("Default collation"));
411  }
412 
413  //
414  // These don't have mappings in Java...
415  //
416  charsetsToLoad.remove("swe7");
417  charsetsToLoad.remove("hp8");
418  charsetsToLoad.remove("dec8");
419  charsetsToLoad.remove("koi8u");
420  charsetsToLoad.remove("keybcs2");
421  charsetsToLoad.remove("geostd8");
422  charsetsToLoad.remove("armscii8");
423  } finally {
424  if (this.rs != null) {
425  this.rs.close();
426  }
427  }
428 
429  return charsetsToLoad;
430  }

607  public void testBug6966() throws Exception {

634  + port + ",slave:" + port + "/", props);

638  failoverConnection, 1, "SELECT CONNECTION_ID()").toString();

642  }

651  failoverConnection, 1, "SELECT CONNECTION_ID()").toString();

654  .hasTriedMaster());
655 
656  assertTrue(!newConnectionId.equals(originalConnectionId));
657

659  } finally {

664  }
665  }

1400  public void testBug15065() throws Exception {
1401  if (isRunningOnJdk131()) {
1402  return; // test not valid on JDK-1.3.1
1403  }
1404 
1405  createTable("testBug15065", "(field1 int)");
1406 
1407  this.stmt.executeUpdate("INSERT INTO testBug15065 VALUES (1)");
1408 
1409  Connection advisorConn = null;
1410  Statement advisorStmt = null;
1411 
1412  try {
1413  Properties props = new Properties();
1414  props.setProperty("useUsageAdvisor", "true");
1415  props.setProperty("logger", "com.mysql.jdbc.log.StandardLogger");
1416 
1417  advisorConn = getConnectionWithProps(props);
1418  advisorStmt = advisorConn.createStatement();
1419 
1420  Method[] getMethods = ResultSet.class.getMethods();
1421 
1422  PrintStream oldErr = System.err;
1423 
1424  try {
1425  ByteArrayOutputStream bOut = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
1426  System.setErr(new PrintStream(bOut));
1427 
1428  HashMap<String, String> methodsToSkipMap = new HashMap<String, String>();
1429 
1430  // Needs an actual URL
1431  methodsToSkipMap.put("getURL", null);
1432 
1433  // Java6 JDBC4.0 methods we don't implement
1434  methodsToSkipMap.put("getNCharacterStream", null);
1435  methodsToSkipMap.put("getNClob", null);
1436  methodsToSkipMap.put("getNString", null);
1437  methodsToSkipMap.put("getRowId", null);
1438  methodsToSkipMap.put("getSQLXML", null);
1439 
1440  for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++) {
1441  for (int i = 0; i < getMethods.length; i++) {
1442  String methodName = getMethods[i].getName();
1443 
1444  if (methodName.startsWith("get")
1445  && !methodsToSkipMap.containsKey(methodName)) {
1446  Class<?>[] parameterTypes = getMethods[i]
1447  .getParameterTypes();
1448 
1449  if (parameterTypes.length == 1
1450  && parameterTypes[0] == Integer.TYPE) {
1451  if (j == 0) {
1452  this.rs = advisorStmt
1453  .executeQuery("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM testBug15065");
1454  } else {
1455  this.rs = advisorConn
1456  .prepareStatement(
1457  "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM testBug15065")
1458  .executeQuery();
1459  }
1460 
1461  this.rs.next();
1462 
1463  try {
1464 
1465  getMethods[i].invoke(this.rs,
1466  new Object[] { new Integer(1) });
1467  } catch (InvocationTargetException invokeEx) {
1468  // we don't care about bad values, just that
1469  // the
1470  // column gets "touched"
1471  if (!invokeEx
1472  .getCause()
1473  .getClass()
1474  .isAssignableFrom(
1475  java.sql.SQLException.class)
1476  && !invokeEx
1477  .getCause()
1478  .getClass()
1479  .getName()
1480  .equals("com.mysql.jdbc.NotImplemented")
1481  && !invokeEx
1482  .getCause()
1483  .getClass()
1484  .getName()
1485  .equals("java.sql.SQLFeatureNotSupportedException")) {
1486  throw invokeEx;
1487  }
1488  }
1489 
1490  this.rs.close();
1491  this.rs = null;
1492  }
1493  }
1494  }
1495  }
1496 
1497  String logOut = bOut.toString("ISO8859-1");
1498 
1499  if (logOut.indexOf(".Level") != -1) {
1500  return; // we ignore for warnings
1501  }
1502 
1503  assertTrue("Usage advisor complained about columns:\n\n"
1504  + logOut, logOut.indexOf("columns") == -1);
1505  } finally {
1506  System.setErr(oldErr);
1507  }
1508  } finally {
1509  if (advisorConn != null) {
1510  advisorConn.close();
1511  }
1512  }
1513  }

1799 
1800  private int findNamedThreadCount(ThreadGroup group, String nameStart) {
1801 
1802  int count = 0;
1803 
1804  int numThreads = group.activeCount();
1805  Thread[] threads = new Thread[numThreads * 2];
1806  numThreads = group.enumerate(threads, false);
1807 
1808  for (int i = 0; i < numThreads; i++) {
1809  if (threads[i].getName().startsWith(nameStart)) {
1810  count++;
1811  }
1812  }
1813 
1814  int numGroups = group.activeGroupCount();
1815  ThreadGroup[] groups = new ThreadGroup[numGroups * 2];
1816  numGroups = group.enumerate(groups, false);
1817 
1818  for (int i = 0; i < numGroups; i++) {
1819  count += findNamedThreadCount(groups[i], nameStart);
1820  }
1821 
1822  return count;
1823  }

2185  assertTrue(this.rs.next());
2186  assertEquals(this.rs.getInt(1), 1);
2187

2189

2191  this.rs = pingPStmt.getResultSet();
2192  assertTrue(this.rs.next());
2193  assertEquals(this.rs.getInt(1), 1);

2196  assertTrue(this.rs.next());
2197  assertEquals(this.rs.getInt(1), 1);

2476  public void testReplicationConnectionHostManagement() throws Exception {
2477  Properties props = new Properties();
2478  props.setProperty("retriesAllDown", "3");
2479 
2480  ReplicationConnection conn2 = this.getUnreliableReplicationConnection(
2481  new String[] { "first", "second", "third" }, props);
2482  conn2.setAutoCommit(false);
2483  String port = getPort(props, new NonRegisteringDriver());
2484  String firstHost = "first:" + port;
2485  String secondHost = "second:" + port;
2486  String thirdHost = "third:" + port;
2487 
2488  // "first" should be master, "second" and "third"
2489  // should be slaves.
2490  assertTrue(conn2.isHostMaster(firstHost));
2491  assertTrue(conn2.isHostSlave(secondHost));
2492  assertTrue(conn2.isHostSlave(thirdHost));
2493  assertFalse(conn2.isHostSlave(firstHost));
2494  assertFalse(conn2.isHostMaster(secondHost));
2495  assertFalse(conn2.isHostMaster(thirdHost));
2496 
2497  // remove "third" from slave pool:
2498  conn2.removeSlave(thirdHost);
2499  assertFalse(conn2.isHostSlave(thirdHost));
2500  assertFalse(conn2.isHostMaster(thirdHost));
2501 
2502  // add "third" back into slave pool:
2503  conn2.addSlaveHost(thirdHost);
2504  assertTrue(conn2.isHostSlave(thirdHost));
2505  assertFalse(conn2.isHostMaster(thirdHost));
2506  conn2.setReadOnly(false);
2507 
2508  // failover to "second" as master, "first"
2509  // can still be used:
2510  conn2.promoteSlaveToMaster(secondHost);
2511  assertTrue(conn2.isHostMaster(firstHost));
2512  assertFalse(conn2.isHostSlave(firstHost));
2513  assertFalse(conn2.isHostSlave(secondHost));
2514  assertTrue(conn2.isHostMaster(secondHost));
2515  assertTrue(conn2.isHostSlave(thirdHost));
2516  assertFalse(conn2.isHostMaster(thirdHost));
2517 
2518  conn2.removeMasterHost(firstHost);
2519 
2520  // "first" should no longer be used:
2521  conn2.promoteSlaveToMaster(secondHost);
2522  assertFalse(conn2.isHostMaster(firstHost));
2523  assertFalse(conn2.isHostSlave(firstHost));
2524  assertFalse(conn2.isHostSlave(secondHost));
2525  assertTrue(conn2.isHostMaster(secondHost));
2526  assertTrue(conn2.isHostSlave(thirdHost));
2527  assertFalse(conn2.isHostMaster(thirdHost));
2528 
2529  conn2.createStatement().execute("SELECT 1");
2530  assertFalse(conn2.isClosed());
2531 
2532  // check that we're waiting until transaction
2533  // boundary to fail over.
2534 // assertTrue(conn2.hasPendingNewMaster());
2535  assertFalse(conn2.isClosed());
2536  conn2.commit();
2537  assertFalse(conn2.isClosed());
2538  assertTrue(conn2.isHostMaster(secondHost));
2539  assertFalse(conn2.isClosed());
2540  assertTrue(conn2.isMasterConnection());
2541  assertFalse(conn2.isClosed());
2542 
2543  // validate that queries are successful:
2544  conn2.createStatement().execute("SELECT 1");
2545  assertTrue(conn2.isHostMaster(secondHost));
2546 
2547  // master is now offline
2548  UnreliableSocketFactory.downHost("second");
2549  try {
2550  Statement lstmt = conn2.createStatement();
2551  lstmt.execute("SELECT 1");
2552  fail("Should fail here due to closed connection");
2553  } catch (SQLException sqlEx) {
2554  assertEquals("08S01", sqlEx.getSQLState());
2555  }
2556 
2557  UnreliableSocketFactory.dontDownHost("second");
2558  try {
2559  // won't work now even though master is back up
2560  // connection has already been implicitly closed
2561  // when a new master host cannot be found:
2562  conn2.createStatement().execute("SELECT 1");
2563  fail("Will fail because inability to find new master host implicitly closes connection.");
2564  } catch (SQLException e) {
2565  assertEquals("08003", e.getSQLState());
2566  }
2567 
2568  }

2883  public static boolean containsMessage(String msg, String key) {
2884  String[] expectedFragments = Messages.getString(key).split("\\{\\d\\}");
2885  for (int i = 0; i < expectedFragments.length; i++) {
2886  if (msg.indexOf(expectedFragments[i]) < 0) {
2887  return false;
2888  }
2889  }
2890  return true;
2891  }

3229  public static class ForcedLoadBalanceStrategy extends RandomBalanceStrategy {
3230 
3231  private static String forcedFutureServer = null;
3232  private static int forceFutureServerTimes = 0;
3233 
3234  public static void forceFutureServer(String host, int times) {
3235  forcedFutureServer = host;
3236  forceFutureServerTimes = times;
3237  }
3238 
3239  public static void dontForceFutureServer() {
3240  forcedFutureServer = null;
3241  forceFutureServerTimes = 0;
3242  }
3243 
3244  public com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl pickConnection(
3245  LoadBalancingConnectionProxy proxy, List<String> configuredHosts,
3246  Map<String, ConnectionImpl> liveConnections, long[] responseTimes, int numRetries)
3247  throws SQLException {
3248  if (forcedFutureServer == null || forceFutureServerTimes == 0 || !configuredHosts.contains(forcedFutureServer)) {
3249  return super.pickConnection(proxy, configuredHosts,
3250  liveConnections, responseTimes, numRetries);
3251  }
3252  if (forceFutureServerTimes > 0) {
3253  forceFutureServerTimes--;
3254  }
3255  ConnectionImpl conn = liveConnections
3256  .get(forcedFutureServer);
3257 
3258  if (conn == null) {
3259  conn = proxy.createConnectionForHost(forcedFutureServer);
3260 
3261  }
3262  return conn;
3263  }

3266  super.destroy();
3267 
3268  }

3272  super.init(conn, props);
3273 
3274  }
3275

3652  public void testBug63284() throws Exception {
3653  Properties props = new Driver().parseURL(BaseTestCase.dbUrl, null);
3654  props.setProperty("autoReconnect", "true");
3655  props.setProperty("socketFactory", "testsuite.UnreliableSocketFactory");
3656 
3657  Properties urlProps = new NonRegisteringDriver().parseURL(
3658  BaseTestCase.dbUrl, null);
3659 
3660  String host = urlProps.getProperty(Driver.HOST_PROPERTY_KEY);
3661  String port = urlProps.getProperty(Driver.PORT_PROPERTY_KEY);
3662 
3663  props.remove(Driver.HOST_PROPERTY_KEY);
3664  props.remove(Driver.NUM_HOSTS_PROPERTY_KEY);
3665  props.remove(Driver.HOST_PROPERTY_KEY + ".1");
3666  props.remove(Driver.PORT_PROPERTY_KEY + ".1");
3667 
3668  props.setProperty("queriesBeforeRetryMaster", "50");
3669  props.setProperty("maxReconnects", "1");
3670 
3671  UnreliableSocketFactory.mapHost("master", host);
3672  UnreliableSocketFactory.mapHost("slave", host);
3673 
3674  Connection failoverConnection1 = null;
3675  Connection failoverConnection2 = null;
3676 
3677  try{
3678  failoverConnection1 = getConnectionWithProps("jdbc:mysql://master:"
3679  + port + ",slave:" + port + "/", props);
3680 
3681  failoverConnection2 = getConnectionWithProps("jdbc:mysql://master:"
3682  + port + ",slave:" + port + "/", props);
3683 
3684  assert(((com.mysql.jdbc.Connection)failoverConnection1).isMasterConnection());
3685 
3686  // Two different Connection objects should not equal each other:
3687  assert(!failoverConnection1.equals(failoverConnection2));
3688 
3689  int hc = failoverConnection1.hashCode();
3690 
3691  UnreliableSocketFactory.downHost("master");
3692 
3693  for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ){
3694  try{
3695  failoverConnection1.createStatement().execute("SELECT 1");
3696  } catch (SQLException e){
3697  // do nothing, expect SQLException when failing over initially
3698  // goal here is to ensure valid connection against a slave
3699  }
3700  }
3701  // ensure we're now connected to the slave
3702  assert(!((com.mysql.jdbc.Connection)failoverConnection1).isMasterConnection());
3703 
3704  // ensure that hashCode() result is persistent across failover events when proxy state changes
3705  assert(failoverConnection1.hashCode() == hc);
3706  } finally {
3707  if (failoverConnection1 != null) {
3708  failoverConnection1.close();
3709  }
3710  if (failoverConnection2 != null) {
3711  failoverConnection2.close();
3712  }
3713  }
3714  }

4112  public boolean nextAuthenticationStep(Buffer fromServer, List<Buffer> toServer) throws SQLException {
4113  toServer.clear();
4114  this.counter++;
4115  if ((fromServer.getByteBuffer()[0] & 0xff) == 4) {
4116  Buffer bresp = new Buffer(StringUtils.getBytes(counter>2 ? this.password : "wrongpassword"+counter));
4117  toServer.add(bresp);
4118  } else {
4119  Buffer bresp = new Buffer(fromServer.getByteBuffer());
4120  toServer.add(bresp);
4121  }

4519  public void testBug14563127() throws Exception {
4520  Properties props = new Properties();
4521  props.setProperty("loadBalanceStrategy",
4522  ForcedLoadBalanceStrategy.class.getName());
4523  props.setProperty("loadBalanceBlacklistTimeout", "5000");
4524  props.setProperty("loadBalancePingTimeout", "100");
4525  props.setProperty("loadBalanceValidateConnectionOnSwapServer", "true");
4526 
4527  String portNumber = new NonRegisteringDriver().parseURL(dbUrl, null)
4528  .getProperty(NonRegisteringDriver.PORT_PROPERTY_KEY);
4529 
4530  if (portNumber == null) {
4531  portNumber = "3306";
4532  }
4533 
4534  ForcedLoadBalanceStrategy.forceFutureServer("first:" + portNumber, -1);
4535  Connection conn2 = this.getUnreliableLoadBalancedConnection(
4536  new String[] { "first", "second" }, props);
4537  conn2.setAutoCommit(false);
4538  conn2.createStatement().execute("SELECT 1");
4539 
4540  // make sure second is added to active connections cache:
4541  ForcedLoadBalanceStrategy.forceFutureServer("second:" + portNumber, -1);
4542  conn2.commit();
4543 
4544  // switch back to first:
4545  ForcedLoadBalanceStrategy.forceFutureServer("first:" + portNumber, -1);
4546  conn2.commit();
4547 
4548  // kill second while still in cache:
4549  UnreliableSocketFactory.downHost("second");
4550 
4551  // force second host to be selected next time:
4552  ForcedLoadBalanceStrategy.forceFutureServer("second:" + portNumber, 1);
4553 
4554  try {
4555  conn2.commit(); // will be on second after this
4556  assertTrue("Connection should not be closed", !conn2.isClosed());
4557  } catch (SQLException e) {
4558  fail("Should not error because failure to select another server.");
4559  }
4560  conn2.close();
4561 
4562 
4563  }

5189  protected int testServerPrepStmtDeadlockCounter = 0;

5191  class PollTask implements Runnable {
5192 
5193  private Connection c;
5194  private int num = 0;
5195 
5196  private Statement st1 = null;
5197  private PreparedStatement pst1 = null;
5198 
5199  PollTask(Connection cn, int n) throws SQLException {
5200  this.c = cn;
5201  this.num = n;
5202 
5203  this.st1 = c.createStatement();
5204  this.pst1 = c.prepareStatement("SELECT 1 FROM DUAL");
5205  }
5206 
5207  public void run() {
5208  System.out.println(this.num + ". Start polling at "+new Date().getTime());
5209  boolean connectionClosed = false;
5210 
5211  for (int i = 0; i < 20000; i++) {
5212  try {
5213  this.st1.executeQuery("SELECT 1 FROM DUAL").close();
5214  this.pst1.executeQuery().close();
5215  } catch (Exception ex1) {
5216  if (!connectionClosed) {
5217  System.out.println(this.num + "." + i + " "+ex1.getMessage());
5218  connectionClosed = true;
5219  } else {
5220  break;
5221  }
5222  }
5223  }
5224 
5225  ConnectionRegressionTest.this.testServerPrepStmtDeadlockCounter++;
5226  System.out.println(this.num + ". Done!");
5227  }
5228 
5229  }
5230 
5231  class CancelTask implements Runnable {
5232 
5233  private Connection c;
5234  private int num = 0;
5235 
5236  CancelTask(Connection cn, int n) throws SQLException {
5237  this.c = cn;
5238  this.num = n;
5239  }
5240 
5241  public void run() {
5242  System.out.println(this.num + ". Start cancelling at "+new Date().getTime());
5243 
5244  if (Proxy.isProxyClass(c.getClass())) {
5245  try {
5246  if (this.num == 7 || this.num == 10) {
5247  Proxy.getInvocationHandler(c).invoke(c, Connection.class.getMethod("close", new Class[]{}), null);
5248  } else if (this.num == 8 || this.num == 11) {
5249  Proxy.getInvocationHandler(c).invoke(c, MySQLConnection.class.getMethod("abortInternal", new Class[]{}), null);
5250  } else if (this.num == 9 || this.num == 12) {
5251  Proxy.getInvocationHandler(c).invoke(c, com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.class.getMethod("abort", new Class[]{Executor.class}), new Object[]{ new ThreadPerTaskExecutor()});
5252  }
5253 
5254  ConnectionRegressionTest.this.testServerPrepStmtDeadlockCounter++;
5255  System.out.println(this.num + ". Done!");
5256  } catch (Throwable e) {
5257  e.printStackTrace();
5258  }
5259  }
5260  }
5261

5326  case 2:

5379  statement.close();
5380  }

5395  System.out.println("Test related connections in MAP before GC: " + connectionNumber);

5406  System.out.println("MAP: " + connectionTrackingMap.size());

5411  private int countTestConnections(Map<?,?> connectionTrackingMap, Field referentField, boolean show, String attributValue) throws Exception {
5412  int connectionNumber = 0;
5413  for (Object o1 : connectionTrackingMap.keySet()) {
5414  com.mysql.jdbc.Connection ctmp = (com.mysql.jdbc.Connection) referentField.get(o1);
5415  try {
5416  if (ctmp != null && ctmp.getConnectionAttributes() != null && ctmp.getConnectionAttributes().equals(attributValue)) {
5417  connectionNumber++;
5418  if (show) {
5419  System.out.println(ctmp.toString());
5420  }
5421  }
5422  } catch (NullPointerException e) {
5423  System.out.println("NullPointerException: \n"+ctmp+"\n"+ctmp.getConnectionAttributes());
5424  } catch (MySQLNonTransientConnectionException e) {
5425  System.out.println("MySQLNonTransientConnectionException (expected for explicitly closed load-balanced connection)");
5426  }
5427  }
5428  return connectionNumber;
5429  }

5718 
5719  // reflection is needed to access protected info from ConnectionPropertiesImpl.largeRowSizeThreshold

5721  propField.setAccessible(true);

5724  if (nestedClass.getName().equals("com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionPropertiesImpl$IntegerConnectionProperty")) {
5725  propClass = nestedClass;

5730  propMethod.setAccessible(true);
5731 
5732  for (int i = 0; i < testMemUnits.length; i++) {

5735  connWithMemProps = (com.mysql.jdbc.Connection) getConnectionWithProps(String.format(
5736  "blobSendChunkSize=1.2%1$s,largeRowSizeThreshold=1.4%1$s,locatorFetchBufferSize=1.6%1$s",
5737  testMemUnits[i][j]));
5738

5741  (int) (memMultiplier[i] * 1.2), connWithMemProps.getBlobSendChunkSize());
5742

5745  + testMemUnits[i][j], connWithMemProps.getLargeRowSizeThreshold());

5747  (int) (memMultiplier[i] * 1.4),
5748  ((Integer) propMethod.invoke(propField.get(connWithMemProps))).intValue());
5749 
5750  // test values of property 'locatorFetchBufferSize'
5751  assertEquals("Memory unit '" + testMemUnits[i][j] + "'; property 'locatorFetchBufferSize'",

5822  } catch (IOException e) {

5825  }

5828  public void run() {

5830  throw new Error("Mock server not initialized.");
5831  }
5832  Socket clientSocket = null;
5833  try {
5834  while ((clientSocket = this.serverSocket.accept()) != null) {
5835  System.out.println("Client socket accepted: [" + clientSocket.toString() + "]");
5836  }
5837  } catch (IOException e) {
5838  System.out.println("Shutting down mock server.");
5839  } finally {
5840  if (clientSocket != null) {
5841  try {
5842  clientSocket.close();
5843  } catch (IOException e) {
5844  e.printStackTrace();
5845  }
5846  }
5847  }
5848  }
5849  }

5852  MockServer mockServer = new MockServer();
5853  int serverPort = 0;
5854  try {
5855  serverPort = mockServer.initialize();
5856  } catch (IOException e1) {
5857  fail("Failed to initialize a mock server.");
5858  }
5859  final String testURL = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:" + serverPort;
5860  Connection testConn = null;
5861  final int oldLoginTimeout = DriverManager.getLoginTimeout();
5862  final int loginTimeout = 3;
5863  final int testTimeout = loginTimeout * 2;
5864  long timestamp = System.currentTimeMillis();
5865 
5866  try {
5867  DriverManager.setLoginTimeout(loginTimeout);
5868 
5869  executor.execute(mockServer);
5870 
5871  Future<Connection> future = executor.submit(new Callable<Connection>() {
5872  @SuppressWarnings("synthetic-access")
5873  public Connection call() throws Exception {
5874  return getConnectionWithProps(testURL, "");
5875  }
5876  });
5877 
5878  testConn = future.get(testTimeout, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
5879  testConn.close();
5880 
5881  fail("The connection attempt should have timed out.");
5882 
5883  } catch (InterruptedException e) {
5884  e.printStackTrace();
5885  fail("Failed to establish a connection with mock server.");
5886 
5887  } catch (ExecutionException e) {
5888  if (e.getCause() instanceof SQLException) {
5889  e.printStackTrace();
5890  assertTrue(e.getCause().getMessage().startsWith("Communications link failure")
5891  || e.getCause().getMessage().equals(Messages.getString("Connection.LoginTimeout")));
5892 
5893  assertEquals("Login timeout should have occured in (secs.):", loginTimeout,
5894  (System.currentTimeMillis() - timestamp) / 1000);
5895  } else {
5896  fail("Failed to establish a connection with mock server.");
5897  }
5898 
5899  } catch (TimeoutException e) {
5900  fail("Time expired for connection attempt.");
5901 
5902  } finally {
5903  DriverManager.setLoginTimeout(oldLoginTimeout);
5904  mockServer.releaseResources();
5905  executor.shutdownNow();
5906  }
5907  }
